data.message: Am I being punished?  My feed has been showing my most relevant posts shared by friends 8 to 22 hours AFTER they posted. Since we enter Facebook giveaways, and these are often limited in the timeframe in which you can enter, often they are over before I even get the post! But yet you junk up my feed with tons of non-relevant to me advertising and other things that have nothing to do with what my friends are posting.  I am not the Facebook trashbin.  If you have an ad, put it in the sidebar (I do click what is interesting to me).

replies.message: Hi Sheila. If you feel you’re missing stories from a Page or profile you’d like to see, go to the Page or profile and confirm it says Following at the top. You can also adjust your News Feed to make posts from certain Pages or profiles appear at the top by selecting the prioritize who to see first option from your News Feed preferences. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2l8qVd2. -Jessica
